reviews.review: Killing floor 1 Эта очень крутая, интересная, весёлая и брутальная игра. Здесь атмосфера и цветокор очень подходят. kf1 мрачный зомби шутер. Играть одному будет страшно здесь есть некая ,,хоррорность''. музыка на фоне тоже крутая (рок). есть расчлененка. Игроки здесь не тупые школьники. Графика хорошая. 6 классов и много оружии. Короче игра очень крутая даже чу-чуть круче l4d2.  Только ОЧЕНЬ жаль что сервера не так много как раньше. Но обязательно начните играть в эту игру если не играли. 9,9/10
Pues sin mas que decir...buen juego y eso que ya tiene sus años.

Just nope.Bought a sale price package that had the original,and played it for a couple of hours.
Way too murky, smeary,and dark.Ugly game.
The movement isn't good enough.Aiming is fair,acceptable.
You can adjust the settings to make things better,but still not really worth it.
The monsters are OK.But not special.The trader is fun.
Maps are acceptable, but rather predictable.Not sharp.
But the thing that made me dump it was the fact that it tends to get you cornered,and trapped too easily.
Not something I enjoy experiencing in a game.I'm trying to run,and jump,and get away.I spent way to much time just running rather than using the map in a dynamic way.Maybe that's my fault too.But really not worth my time.
But if you enjoy dark murky maps,and monsters that sound like they're retching,you'll probably like this.

C'est un simple défouloir avec de beaux graphismes où l'on dégomme des monstres pour ensuite acheté de nouvelles armes pour au final se taper le boss un peu long à tuer.
Pour moi il ne vaut pas le coup d'être acheté, je l'ai simplement eu dans le pack complet de Killing Floor 1 & 2 et je m'attends au pire pour le 2.
Pour jouer en multi il faut héberger un serveur ou qu'un serveur soit héberger ce qui veut dire payé un serveur pour y jouer en multi, ce qui me dégoûte encore plus du jeu du coup.
Ah et sachez qu'il n'y a plus personne qui joue à ce jeu donc à bannir de vos jeux souhaité si vous comptiez jouer en multi.
Apesar de que el juego esta muriendo sigue siendo igual de entretenido que en 2009.

Что тут можно делать 1к часов? Я не знаю. Достижение с курицей идеально.

게임자체는 굉장히 재밋지만 레벨업이 너무 시간이 오래 걸리고 레벨이 낮으면 숙련자가 아닌 한 피지컬로 극복할 수 없다고 느끼는 부분이 많아 아쉽습니다. 또한, 웨이브와 웨이브 사이의 시간이 너무 길다고 느껴질 때가 있는데 이를 임의조정하게되면 레벨업에 필요한 경험치를 획득할 수 없는 부분도 재미를 감소시킨다고 생각합니다만... 그래도 세일할때 5천원 주고 산 게임 치고는 한판씩 즐기기에 더할나위 없이 좋습니다. 어차피 발매된지 어마어마한 세월이 지난 게임이라 더 패치가 이루어질거라고 생각친 않지만...그래도 아쉬운 부분이 있는건 어쩔수없는 사실이니까 한번 적어봅니다.

Killing Floor является довольно качественным примером превращения мода в полноценную игру. Если к тому, что написано прибавить саундтрек в стиле рок — и вот он, почти идеальный командный шутер с мутантами в качестве пушечного мясца. Хотя лучше в данный продукт играть с компанией — эдак человек 5-6, обмениваясь оружием и деньгами, чувствовать в этой мясорубке плечо товарища. Игра придётся по вкусу всем, но больше всего тем, для кого Counter-Strike — слишком тяжело, а Left 4 Dead — слишком легко. А для тех, кому и этого безумия мало — есть различные «пакеты», с которыми ваша мясорубка станет более праздничной.

Killing Floor é um jogo de Tiro/Ação/Co-Op/Zombie que te faz ficar insano durante a matança. É muito bonito os Mapas,Armas e a Interface principal do Game. O jogo é um pouco caro fora de promoção, mas ja chegou a um preço de R$1,99. Compensa muito por ser leve e ter uma jogabilidade boa e lisa durante as Waves. Recomendo muito pra quem gosta de adrenalina.

以前ノートPC（2013年頃のハイエンド家庭用ノートcorei7、メモリ8G、GT630M）でゲームをしていた時、かなり気に入っていたゲームです。ゲーミングではないノートPCでも設定を下げれば快適にプレイできるくらいに軽いです。
ゲーミングPCを買った今となっては個人的には2のほうが合っていたのでこちらはほとんどプレイしていませんが、ゲーミング環境が整った時最初に買ったゲームがKilling floor2だったのはこのゲームが面白かったからです。
セール時、2と比べて割引が大きかった気がするのでどっちも持ってない人はお試しにこちらから買うのもありだと思います。

[h1][i]"The smelly buggers grabbed me!" -"They're pathetic, like a bunch of bloody Millwall fans!"[/i][/h1]

[i]Killing Floor[/i] was born as a mod for [i]Unreal Tournament 2004[/i] in 2005. It was then developed and released by [i]Tripwire Interactive[/i] in 2009.
You and your teammates are fighting waves of different hostile specimens and are earning "dosh". Between the waves, you can spend your money on weapons, ammunition and equipment.

I really like the gunplay, especially on shotguns, every weapon "feels" right and if you get surrounded, you'll have to keep a cool head and steady aim or rely on your mates to get out of this situation. 
Except on free weekends I mostly had good teammates. That's because the game encourages you to help your teammates. For example, you'll earn money for killing and surviving, healing others is more efficient than healing yourself and you can drop weapons or money for other players.

I also like the perk system. You can select a perk in the beginning of a match or between waves, which provides you bonuses towards weapon types, movement, damage resistance, discount at the traders and much more. You can level them up to increase those bonuses but you'll also level up the others passively by meeting their requirements. 
For example you've selected the commando perk and are using assault rifles but healing other players levels your medic perk and doing headshots your sharpshooter perk, however you only benefit from the commando perk bonuses.

Only downside are the graphics and animations. I'm not a "graphic-wh*re" but even ten years ago the graphics weren't good and most animations are looking funny.

[b]Well, I've to admit, it hasn't stopped me to play and like this game and I always like to remember the good old times, playing with friends, shouting, screaming and laughing in voicechat.[/b]

[h1]Hands down, [i]Killing Floor[/i] is one of the best and intense coop games ever made! I'd like to recommend it to you, but it's pretty dead by now. You could ask in the forums for some matches or take a look at [i]Killing Floor 2[/i] though...[/h1]

+Game is pretty fun and kinda spooky some times.
+Can literally run on the computer from 2005
+Graphics on the highest are bit outdated and the animations looks a little chonky but they still look good and some outdated graphics arn't that bad at all.
+Most servers are modded btw but you can still find a decent amount of vanilla servers. (((Mods: enemy's, weapons, maps, playermodels, and perks. 
-/+ there are some paid DLC weapons and characters (4.99$ - 7.99$) but the games feels still pretty big and fun even without the DLC weapons and PM's.
Would recommend this game to anyone who like PvE FPS games
